tool_description: Search for stocks by name, ticker symbol, or description
name: StockSearch
title: StockSearch

api_list.name: Company Profile
api_list.description: Get a company profile containing information such as a description, sector, address, etc.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stocksearch.p.rapidapi.com/api/stocks/AAPL"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stocksearch.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://stocksearch.p.rapidapi.com/api/stocks/{symbol}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stocksearch.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Query Stocks V2
api_list.description: Search stocks by name, symbol, or related item.

optional_parameters.name: searchMetadata
optional_parameters.description: Search the company's description or related items

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Pagination offset from the previous set of results. For example, if `offset=5`, the results set will start at the 6th item from the total results. Note, 200 is the max number of results that will be returned in total.

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: Max number of results to get in one response. (Max value: 20)

api_list.name: Query Stocks
api_list.description: Search stocks by name or symbol

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: Full or partial ticker symbol or company name
